[https://github.com/mythz/redis-windows https://github.com/mythz/redis-windows]

= Getting Started =

Due to the popularity and simplicity of the Redis protocol there is a plethora of different Redis clients bindings for almost every popular language in use today. 

For .NET applications you can download and get started with [https://github.com/ServiceStack/ServiceStack.Redis ServiceStack's C# Redis client library] - which can also be used on Linux platforms using [http://www.mono-project.com/Main_Page Mono].

For Java applications the most active library at the moment is [http://code.google.com/p/jredis/ JRedis]. For all other language bindings visit the [http://redis.io/clients redis supported languages page].

=== Redis Admin GUI ===
For those interested in having a GUI admin tool to visualize your Redis data should check out the [http://www.servicestack.net/mythz_blog/?p=381 Redis Admin UI]
